function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of upper-room UVGI system due to location and operation","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease propagation in the built environment","Mitigation":"Optimize the placement and operation of UV devices, away from exhaust openings and in consideration of climatic circumstances","Technologies":"Upper-room UVGI systems, HVAC interventions","People":"Building occupants, public health","Owner":"Building managers, HVAC engineers"},{"Description":"Decline in upper-room UVGI systems efficiency with rising humidity levels","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of UVGI system in controlling contagious disease propagation","Mitigation":"Conduct research to determine optimal design and arrangement of upper-room UVGI systems and consider the impact of humidity levels","Technologies":"Research on UVGI system design, HVAC interventions","People":"Building occupants, public health researchers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Risk of virus transmission through building heating systems","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission via direct airflow from heating systems","Mitigation":"Modify heating system designs to reduce the likelihood of virus transmission through direct airflow","Technologies":"Building heating system modifications","People":"Building occupants, public health","Owner":"Building managers, HVAC engineers"}]}
